name: Forrest Gump
summary: The history of the United States from the 1950s to the '70s unfolds from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, who yearns to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

name: Titanic
summary: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

name: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
summary: When their relationship turns sour, a couple undergoes a medical procedure to have each other erased from their memories for ever.

name: Good Will Hunting
summary: Will Hunting, a janitor at M.I.T., has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.

name: Slumdog Millionaire
summary: A Mumbai teenager reflects on his life after being accused of cheating on the Indian version of "Who Wants to be a Millionaire?"

name: Am√©lie
summary: Despite being caught in her imaginative world, Amelie, a young waitress, decides to help people find happiness. Her quest to spread joy leads her on a journey where she finds true love.

name: Silver Linings Playbook
summary: After a stint in a mental institution, former teacher Pat Solitano moves back in with his parents and tries to reconcile with his ex-wife. Things get more challenging when Pat meets Tiffany, a mysterious girl with problems of her own.

name: Life Is Beautiful
summary: When an open-minded Jewish waiter and his son become victims of the Holocaust, he uses a perfect mixture of will, humor and imagination to protect his son from the dangers around their camp.

name: Shrek
summary: A mean lord exiles fairytale creatures to the swamp of a grumpy ogre, who must go on a quest and rescue a princess for the lord in order to get his land back.

name: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button
summary: Tells the story of Benjamin Button, a man who starts aging backwards with consequences.

name: Groundhog Day
summary: A narcissistic, self-centered weatherman finds himself in a time loop on Groundhog Day.

name: Her
summary: In a near future, a lonely writer develops an unlikely relationship with an operating system designed to meet his every need.

name: La La Land
summary: While navigating their careers in Los Angeles, a pianist and an actress fall in love while attempting to reconcile their aspirations for the future.

name: Cast Away
summary: A FedEx executive undergoes a physical and emotional transformation after crash landing on a deserted island.

name: The Notebook
summary: An elderly man reads to a woman with dementia the story of two young lovers whose romance is threatened by the difference in their respective social classes.

name: Casablanca
summary: A cynical expatriate American cafe owner struggles to decide whether or not to help his former lover and her fugitive husband escape the Nazis in French Morocco.

name: The Great Gatsby
summary: A writer and wall street trader, Nick Carraway, finds himself drawn to the past and lifestyle of his mysterious millionaire neighbor, Jay Gatsby, amid the riotous parties of the Jazz Age.

name: Crazy, Stupid, Love.
summary: A middle-aged husband's life changes dramatically when his wife asks him for a divorce. He seeks to rediscover his manhood with the help of a newfound friend, Jacob, learning to pick up girls at bars.

name: 500 Days of Summer
summary: After being dumped by the girl he believes to be his soulmate, hopeless romantic Tom Hansen reflects on their relationship to try and figure out where things went wrong and how he can win her back.

name: Love Actually
summary: Follows the lives of eight very different couples in dealing with their love lives in various loosely interrelated tales all set during a frantic month before Christmas in London, England.
